Posts.Content: May 13, 2012 07:21PM keonghi wrote: Hi etherize, I am in a similar situation.  I have to have an ALND on the right because they didn't know I had cancer on the right until after we got the pathology back from surgery (I had a BMX).  So, since they didn't know then they couldn't do a SNB.  I am still a little unsure what this all in entails but this video helped me understand better. http://vimeo.com/14669290 I am also curious as to how long recovery takes?  Are the drains in as long as the mastectomy ones were? I had mine in for 2 weeks and they were just more of an inconvenience than anything. Let us know when your surgery is cuz I'd like to see how it goes with you (I don't have a date yet). Kristi
